long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e: To blocker unwanted ads on websites
long.en,en_AU:
Ad Blocker Chrome extension blocks annoying ads from appearing on all websites, including popular video streaming sites such as YouTube and Twitch. This ad blocker is capable of blocking all types of ads, including pop-up and banner ads. 

Why Ad Bloker Is Useful?  

Here are some advantages of using an Ad Blocker: 

-Ad Free Browsing: This extension lets you surf the internet without annoying ads. It easily blocks distracting pop-ups and unskippable video ads and enables you to consume the website content on your favorite websites. 

- Remove un-skippable video ads: This Ad Blocker helps you get rid of unskippable videos ads on popular video streaming platforms such as YouTube, Twitch. 

How To Use Ad Blocker?   
- Ad Blocker works automatically  
- Just install the extension by clicking on the "Add to Chrome" option  
-Visit your favorite website and browse without interruptions 

Key Features     
- Automatically blocks ads after installation  
- Blocks ads on all the websites  
- Allow users to browse the internet without annoying advertisements
